description:
The truth behind Sedna`s identity has been revealed, but it`s too late. The Bermuda Stones are shattered, and Urin has been completely changed, taking on Sedna`s physical form. In the suffocating darkness, is there any hope left for the light?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Heart of the Island, Heart of the People
Shima no Kokoro Hito no Kokoro
